title: Announcement, Poetry Resource Center of Michigan Benefit Party, 1981
title_raw: Poetry Resource Center of Michigan Benefit Party
signed: Signature imprinted in black at lower left corner: Design: Edward Fella
inscribed: Imprinted in black across upper edge, center: Poetry Resource Center/ of Michigan; across upper left quadrant: Benefit Party for/ and Opening of/ our new/ Poetry Center; in black and red, down center: October/10,/ 1981/ from/ 8p.m./ to/ 2a.m./ Read your poetry for/ 10/ minutes/ Music by The Layabouts/ Minimum donation/ $/10/ per couple($5 per person)/--but any additonal donation (tax exempt) will be greatly appreciated/ Includes beer and refreshments; in red, left edge, center: Poetry Marathon; in black, lower edge, center: All at the/ Focus Gallery space/ 743 Beaubien at Lafayette/ Detroit/ 964-0888
description: Poster announcement, printed in red and black, for benfit party for Poetry Resouce Center of Michigan.  Down center, text in red and black, with numbers enlarged, giving date, time, admission cost, and additonal information.  Geometric embellishments at sides and lower edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Poetry Resource Center of Michigan Benefit Party, 1981. Offset lithograph on white paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-39.
